span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ü§ñ New AI Initiative
Agent, Model, or AI-Powered Feature

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 1: Score IMPACT (1-5)
Max of:
üí∞ Financial (1=<$1K loss, 5=>$1M)
üì¢ Reputational (1=Internal, 5=Brand crisis)
‚öñÔ∏è Legal (1=None, 5=Existential)
‚öôÔ∏è Operational (1=Nice-to-have, 5=Failure)
üè• Human Safety (1=None, 5=Life-threatening)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 2: Score LIKELIHOOD (1-5)
Probability of risk materializing:
1 = Rare (<5%)
2 = Unlikely (5-20%)
3 = Possible (20-50%)
4 = Likely (50-80%)
5 = Almost Certain (>80%)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 3: Score AUTONOMY (1-5)
Level of AI decision-making:
1 = Human-in-loop (review every decision)
2 = Recommend & Wait (AI suggests, human approves)
3 = Act & Notify (AI acts, human can undo)
4 = Semi-Autonomous (periodic audits)
5 = Fully Autonomous (no oversight)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
CALCULATE RISK SCORE
Risk Score = Impact √ó Likelihood √ó Autonomy
Range: 1 to 125

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Risk Score
1-7?

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Risk Score
8-19?

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Risk Score
20-39?

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Risk Score
40-79?

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Risk Score
80-125?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TIER 1: MINIMAL RISK
‚úÖ DRI Self-Certifies
‚è±Ô∏è Same-day approval
üìù Basic documentation
Examples:
‚Ä¢ Internal productivity tools
‚Ä¢ Low-stakes automation
‚Ä¢ No customer impact

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TIER 2: LOW RISK
üë§ Manager Review Required
‚è±Ô∏è 1 business day SLA
üìù Standard documentation
Examples:
‚Ä¢ Customer-facing chatbot
‚Ä¢ Email automation
‚Ä¢ Basic lead scoring

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TIER 3: MEDIUM RISK
üë• Director + Compliance Review
‚è±Ô∏è 2 business days SLA
üìù Full documentation + bias testing
Examples:
‚Ä¢ Automated pricing
‚Ä¢ Resume screening
‚Ä¢ Fraud detection

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TIER 4: HIGH RISK
üëî VP + Legal + Compliance Review
‚è±Ô∏è 3 business days SLA
üìù Comprehensive docs + audits
Examples:
‚Ä¢ Credit scoring
‚Ä¢ Hiring decisions
‚Ä¢ Medical triage

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TIER 5: EXTREME RISK
üèõÔ∏è Board + Ethics Board Review
‚è±Ô∏è 5 business days SLA
üìù Full audit + external review
Examples:
‚Ä¢ Autonomous financial trading
‚Ä¢ Clinical diagnosis AI
‚Ä¢ Legal sentencing AI

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
CONFIGURE 5 ALERT TYPES
üéØ Alert 1: Low Confidence (<80%)
üí∞ Alert 2: High-Impact Decision (>$X or >Y people)
‚ö†Ô∏è Alert 3: Edge Case (unexpected input)
‚öñÔ∏è Alert 4: Bias Detected (demographic parity <95%)
üìâ Alert 5: Performance Degradation (accuracy <90%)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
‚úÖ APPROVED FOR PRODUCTION
Monitor continuously:
‚Ä¢ 8 universal AI agent KPIs
‚Ä¢ Governance metrics (bias, fairness)
‚Ä¢ Monthly audits
‚Ä¢ Human accountability maintained

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
EXAMPLE 1: Invoice Processing AI
Impact: 3 (could lose $10K-$100K)
Likelihood: 2 (85% accuracy = 15% error)
Autonomy: 4 (auto-processes, human audits)
Risk Score: 3√ó2√ó4 = 24
‚û°Ô∏è TIER 3 (Medium)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
EXAMPLE 2: Lead Scoring AI
Impact: 3 (missed revenue)
Likelihood: 3 (75% accuracy)
Autonomy: 4 (semi-autonomous)
Risk Score: 3√ó3√ó4 = 36
‚û°Ô∏è TIER 3 (Medium)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
EXAMPLE 3: Medical Diagnosis AI
Impact: 5 (life-threatening)
Likelihood: 3 (possible errors)
Autonomy: 2 (doctor reviews all)
Risk Score: 5√ó3√ó2 = 30
‚û°Ô∏è TIER 3 (Medium)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
EXAMPLE 4: Autonomous Trading AI
Impact: 5 (>$1M at risk)
Likelihood: 4 (market volatility)
Autonomy: 5 (fully autonomous)
Risk Score: 5√ó4√ó5 = 100
‚û°Ô∏è TIER 5 (Extreme)
